summary: This module defines a collection of reusable generic class‑based views and mixins that encapsulate common edit operations—rendering forms, validating input, creating, updating, and deleting model instances, and generating appropriate HTTP responses—while delegating template rendering to subclasses.
business_intent: To streamline the implementation of CRUD functionality in Django applications by providing ready‑made, extensible view components that manage form processing and model lifecycle, thereby reducing boiler‑plate code for developers.
